bike.description: P. Series double-butted Reynolds 520 Cr-Mo 24", 21.6" TT, externally relieved MID BB shell and integrated headset, removable seatstay-mounted U-brake bosses, 5mm 3D dropouts for 14mm axle, integrated chain tensioner and hardware

components.description: Tapered and butted Cr-Mo blades, 1-1/8" threadless, 5mm dropouts for 3/8" axle
Integrated 1-1/8" threadless, Campy-style, full cartridge bearings
P. Series drop type, forged alloy, front load w/ CNC side holes, black hardware, 22.2mm
Cr-Mo 2pc., 11º backsweep, 2º upsweep, 22.2mm
P. Grip, flanged soft compound, open end w/ endplug, 150mm
Tektro FX-340 U-brake, melt forged, single bushing, coil spring, 15mm offset arms, soft compound pad
Lever "U" brake, 15mm cable pull
CNC 1/2" x 1/8" x 10t driver
KMC Z510XRB, 1/2" x 1/8", heavy duty, anti-drop inner links
3pc. tubular, heat-treated Cr-Mo for 8 spline, 175mm length
CNC cut 6061, 25T, Motostar design
MID BB, 2x sealed cartridge bearing w/ 19mm, 8-spline, hollow Cr-Mo spindle, alloy tube, and cone spacers
P. Lo Pro nylon platform w/ molded pins, loose ball, 9/16"
P. 24, alloy double-wall, 36mm, pinned, 36h
Mid-flange, 2x sealed cartridge bearing, 3/8" forged female bolt-in axles w/ 7075 alloy inner axle, 36h
Low flange, CNCd 10t cog driver, 4x sealed cartridge bearings, hollow 14mm Cr-Mo axle w/ 23mm contact, 17mm axle nuts, 36h
Stainless, 2.0mm (14g)
Specialized Compound, 30 TPI, wire bead, 24x2.2"
Specialized Compound, 30 TPI, wire bead, 24x2.2"
Schrader valve
P. Combo, 1pc co-molded composite saddle and alloy 25.4mm seat post combination w/ embossed "P. Series" logo padded cover
Alloy, 25.4mm, no offset
Integrated Cr-Mo bolt and nylock nut
Owners manual, chainguard, reflectors
